title: Family - 5CD Promo Box (2004 Japanese) [FLAC]
description:
Music : Rock : Lossless
FAMILY 5CD PROMO BOX
Air Mail Recordings - AIRAC-1086/1090 Japan 2004

Family paper sleeve collection (rare 2004 Japanese only promotional sample 5-CD album set), issued to radio stations
and reviewers ahead of the actual release date. This set includes the albums: A Song For Me, Anyway, Fearless,
Bandstand and It's Only A Movie, each featuring bonus tracks [22 bonus recordings in total including live versions].

Each disc is custom stamped on the inner rim with each housed in a mini replica LP style gatefold card picture
sleeve replicating the original sleeves.
This set comes housed in a rare textured picture box featuring the artwork for the 'A Song For Me' album on the front
and images of the all the albums on the back, this box was only available for when pre-ordering the whole set.
